channel.title: alv's temporary webzone
channel.description: this is a repo for all my half-baked thoughts

item.title: all wordles to date
item.author: Author
item.description: i enjoy playing wordle in the morning, even if i’m not very good at it. it’s kind of like scrabble without any of the commitment. an unintended consequence of trying to share this was having to change the configuration of this dumb site to allow emojis and learn some markdown, but what a pain. good new is that i now can unnecessarily emphasize things and slap emojis everywhere ðŸ¤ª take care, dear readers ðŸ™‚

item.title: until the horror goes
item.author: Author
item.description: i’ve been listening to this john congleton and the nighty nite album on repeat. it encapsulates some feelings that i’ve been harboring for a little bit. he addresses existential dread and the transience of life in an interesting way. standouts: animal rites, your temporary custodian, canaries in the coal mine, who could love you lucille?, you are facing the wrong way

item.title: the first post
item.author: Author
item.description: hello, everyone! i was bored so i decided to create a website to pass the time. maybe i will do something interesting with this later when i get the hang of it. who knows! love you all xoxo, your favourite admin
